question: Provide PMIDs supporting that ALK R1275Q confers sensitivity to Lorlatinib.
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'ALK R1275Q'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Lorlatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lorlatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lorlatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'MGMT Promoter Methylation'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Temozolomide')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Temozolomide'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Temozolomide')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Vincristine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vincristine'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vincristine')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Mirdametinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Mirdametinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Mirdametinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'RRM1 Underexpression'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Carboplatin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Carboplatin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Carboplatin')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'STK11 Loss'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Everolimus')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Everolimus'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Everolimus')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'YAP1 Overexpression'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Docetaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Docetaxel'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Docetaxel')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'ERBB2 Amplification'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('MTOR Kinase Inhibitor PP242')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('MTOR Kinase Inhibitor PP242'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('MTOR Kinase Inhibitor PP242')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Cite PMIDs showing FANCC Loss-of-function predicts sensitivity to Chlorambucil.
cypher:

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cabozantinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cabozantinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cabozantinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'ASS1 Loss'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Chloroquine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Chloroquine'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Chloroquine')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Neratinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Neratinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Neratinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'EWSR1 EWSR1::NR4A3 Fusion'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Pazopanib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pazopanib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pazopanib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'FLT3 ITD&F691(I/L)'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Ponatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ponatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ponatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
